title: Nubia scrapbook
creator: American University in Cairo. Social Research Center.
description: This scrapbook--created by the Social Research Center at the American University in Cairo--documents life in Nubia through photographs. Topics include work, leisure, architecture, and agriculture among other subjects. Some pages are missing photographs.
subject: Nubia -- Social life and customs; Africa -- Nubia; Agriculture -- Egypt; Architecture -- Egypt; Women -- Egypt; Egypt--Rural conditions; Egypt -- Social life and customs
rights: Copyright 2017, American University in Cairo. All rights reserved.
repository: Rare Books and Special Collections Digital Library
